title: Scarce Orr Old Judge Script Card for sale (360-3)

posts.post_title: Scarce Orr Old Judge Script Card for sale (360-3)
posts.post_content:
Card is from the scarce script series of 1886/1887. Back is perfect.  Price is $1450 delivered. If interested, please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks--Jay

It had to be an Orr. So tempted, but I can't swing it this time.
